text: The Alexander ALX300 is a single-decker body of a bus. It had a low floor. It was built from 1997 to 2007. It was built by Alexander and then Transbus International and then Alexander Dennis. The ALX300 body could be built on the MAN 18.220 chassis, Volvo B10BLE chassis and DAF SB220 chassis. == Notes == == References == == Other websites == ALX300 Category:Low-floor buses
title: Alexander ALX300
